subsection.name: Where are the sources?
subsection.p: You can obtain the sources of jLBC by downloading a distro package or by checking out the latest head revision from the repository.

subsection.name: Build System
subsection.p:
jLBC is built using Maven 2. You can download it from http://maven.apache.org.
There are a few dependencies which are hosted on any publicly available Maven Repository so Maven will be able to resolve them automatically.
